name: Dice Fantasy
description:
Created in 3 evenings (after work) for the Eggstravaganza game Jam.

Use dice to defeat the evil that threatens easter!

Power up your (alien) easter allies and crack some eggs.

Your turn:

Roll 3 dice 

Click and drag dice to use on your monsters

Dice abilities:

1 - Hatch an egg or get a new one (if slot is empty)

2 - Hatch an egg or get a new one (if slot is empty)

3 - Attack

4 - Attack

5 - Attack

6 - Evolve

Click end turn when finished

Enemy Turn:

Enemy rolls 3 dice 

Dice abilities:

1 - Sweep Attack

2 - Sweep Attack

3 - Power Attack

4 - Power Attack

5 - Power Attack

6 - Evolve

Ends it's turn when dice used

Tip:

Each monster has different strengths, if you keep wiping try a different strategy i.e. evolve 1 monster fast to level 5 then work on others.

Art, design and code - Mitchell Dixon
